name: Garbage Truck: Phoenix, AZ
description:
Garbage Truck: Phoenix, AZ

First of the Garbage Trucks of the USA Series

A fun and cute interactive app for Kids!

Ride along on a garbage truck on garbage day as it drives through a neighborhood in Phoenix, AZ. Help the garbage man pick up the garbage cans. A real treat for those little garbage truck enthusiasts and a great way to encourage curiosity and interaction for all. Touch the driver and he honks the horn. Touch a cloud as it passes by and it smiles and hums. The neighborhood is interactive. When your child touches people, animals, or objects they make sounds and perform actions. Its like a moving story book!

A great way to explore the sights and sounds of a typical neighborhood on garbage day in Phoenix, Arizona.

*Compatible with: iPod Touch 3 & 4 generation, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 5, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus and all iPads

-----------------------------------------------

*Note: NOT Compatible with: First generation iPhone, iPhone 3G, and iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation.


-----------------------------------------------
